articles.title: Delete ‘Go SMS Pro’ From Your Android Now - Lifehacker Australia
articles.description: The Go SMS Pro texting app has over 100 million installations from the Google Play Store, but popularity doesn’t matter: You need to stop using it and delete it from your phone now. Cybersecurity firm Trustwave recently discovered a major security loophole in…
